data.Name: Itchy-o 2022 Tetrapolar Purification Ceremony
data.Description: AGES 16+ WELCOME WITH VALID ID. No exceptions for anyone under the age of 16. DOORS: 7PM SHOW: 8PM *Support Acts Subject To Change Without Notice THE FILLMORE AUDITORIUM IS A GENERAL ADMISSION VENUE. This is an experiential and physically immersive event that can push some personal boundaries. Opting out of any activity/interaction is always an option. This show also utilizes strobe lights, electromagnetic fields of energy, and high voltage. ITCHY-O is not responsible for any damaged electronic devices. Those with pacemakers are advised to keep a minimum 30FT distance from the high voltage effects at all times. Those with pacemakers, seizure disorders, under psychiatric care, and hearing aides, enter at your own risk. Thank you, ITCHY-O
